sentences.english: At the end of the term, you typically get no cash back.
sentences.chinese: 固定年限到期后，你一般不会得到任何现金返还。

sentences.english: The most recent recession has increased the need to extend working life.
sentences.chinese: 最近的经济衰退，令更多的人有延长工作年限的需求。

sentences.english: The stoves are designed to have a lifetime of up to three years at a cost of about fifteen dollars.
sentences.chinese: 这个灶具的最常使用年限为3年，造价约15美元。

sentences.english: None of these players has a long shelf-life.
sentences.chinese: 这些球员没有一个有着长的踢球年限。

sentences.english: A wine that is too old may also be vinegary.
sentences.chinese: 而当酒贮放年限太久也会衰退而有醋酸味。

sentences.english: In the diplomas shall be recorded the length of study and the subjects studied.
sentences.chinese: 结业证书应当载明修业年限和学业内容。

sentences.english: The taproot of the ramets could survive for five years at most.
sentences.chinese: 分株主根的生活年限最多为5年。

sentences.english: The duration of studies leading to higher level diplomas depends on the type of faculty.
sentences.chinese: 较高水平的文凭学习年限由专业类型来决定。

sentences.english: Note: All time limit refers to the continuous time span before the date of application.
sentences.chinese: 本条所指年限均指申请之日前连续的年限。

sentences.english: Note: All time limit refers to the continuous time span before the date of application.
sentences.chinese: 本条所指年限均指申请之日前连续的年限。

sentences.english: Model steel profile of the main market is engineering, use fixed number of year 1 years.
sentences.chinese: 塑钢型材的主要市场是工程，使用年限1年左右。

sentences.english: Your years of service entitle you to a pension.
sentences.chinese: 你的服务年限使你有资格领取养老金。

sentences.english: The Bijia mountain ecological landscape area construction, the deadline of planning is five years.
sentences.chinese: 笔架山红枣生态景观区建设，规划年限五年。

sentences.english: The duration of graduate student cannot exceed 4 years.
sentences.chinese: 硕士生的学习年限最长不超过4年。

sentences.english: Therefore the service life of superheater is mainly dependent on the corrosion speed of tube top.
sentences.chinese: 因此，过热器的使用年限全取决于管头的腐蚀速度。

sentences.english: The taxiway bridge have been built for long years and with high loading.
sentences.chinese: 机场滑行道桥建筑年限久，荷载大，断交难。

definition: to expire/to run out/to come to an end
provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
the end of fixed period in office/expiration of a term
Yanchang county in Yan'an 延安[Yan2 an1], Shaanxi
according to provisions/as stipulated in the rules
to fall due (loan etc)/to expire (visa etc)/to mature (investment bond etc)
period during which one can prosecute or sue sb/within the statute of limitation
